Definition.WordDefinition:
Desperately \Des"per*ate*ly\, adv. In a desperate manner; without regard to danger or safety; recklessly; extremely; as, the troops fought desperately. [1913 Webster]
She fell desperately in love with him. --Addison. [1913 Webster]

desperately adv 1: with great urgency; "health care reform is needed urgently"; "the soil desperately needed potash" [syn: {urgently}] 2: in intense despair; "the child clung desperately to her mother"
